pkgmetadata.longdescription: tinyxxd is a standalone fork of xxd, a slight modernization of the C code, a slight performance increase and a drop-in replacement for xxd. It contains the same logic and supports the exact same flags. tinyxxd can be useful in connection with building and packaging software, since it's a smaller dependency than ViM, only requires a C11 compiler and is slightly faster.

use.flag: use it as a replacement for xxd
